text:
Description: Improve how Grove discovers, stores, and displays git worktrees.

## Goals
1. Consistent worktree directory structure (e.g., ~/.grove/worktrees/<project>/<branch>)
2. Better project grouping in menubar UI using main_repo
3. Centralized worktree storage option
4. Ensure all servers have corresponding worktree entries with main_repo populated

## Background
Currently worktrees are scattered across the filesystem. The menubar groups them by parent directory which isn't always meaningful. This epic tracks improvements to make worktree management more intuitive.
Close reason: All 4 child tasks completed: worktree create command, auto-register main_repo, Remove All button, improved group names
